package.name: rtt_rtcf_example_msgs
package.description:
Provides an rtt typekit for ROS rtcf_example_msgs messages.
It allows you to use ROS messages transparently in RTT components and applications.
This package was automatically generated by the create_rtt_msgs generator and should not be manually modified.
See the http://ros.org/wiki/rtcf_example_msgs documentation for the documentation of the ROS messages in this typekit.
